ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Faithful Ruh brought it down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Which the trusted spirit descended with
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: which the truthful spirit has carried down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It has been revealed through the trustworthy Spirit
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The Trustworthy Spirit brought it down. (Angel Jibreel – peace be upon him.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Which the trustworthy Ruh (Jibril) has brought down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The Faithful Spirit has descended with it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: brought down by the Faithful Spirit
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Which the True Spirit hath brought down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the Faithful Spirit has brought it down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The Trusted spirit hath brought it down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: brought down by the Trustworthy Spirit
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: With it came down the spirit of Faith and Truth-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Which the trustworthy Ruh [Jibrael (Gabriel)] has brought down;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The honest Spirit (Gabriel) brought it down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Honest Spirit came down with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:193] brought down by the Trustworthy Spirit, Gabriel,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Which the True Spirit hath brought down) Allah sent down Gabriel, the trustworthy Gabriel, to convey the message to His prophets,
